name: Dungeon Roller (AriNeonShark)
description:
In Dungeon Roller you play as a die navigating an ever-changing landscape in the abyss. You initially are a clean slate with nothing to your name. As you go deeper in to the beckoning depths, you will acquire new skills on your 6 faces. Be warned, there are others alone down there... And they love pushing dice around...

How to play

  • MOVE: Arrow keys / Gamepad Leftstick
  • JUMP: Spacebar / Z / Q / Gamepad west / Gamepad south

All else will become apparent.

THE SAME BUILD IN BROWSER: https://arikwex.github.io/dungeon-rollers

Couldn't submit the html5 version on itch in time due to server meltdown party...
